_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The three things that an educated noble: The gratification when it comes to form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness
The drawback when it comes to form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness
The escape when it comes to form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness
